text: LED lights in the shower that bathe a user in colour and a reclaimed wood accent wall near the fireplace. Artisan hand - baked clay tiles as a kitchen backsplash and a bathroom exhaust fan that turns on and off through a sensor. A barn door on the master bedroom closet and upper kitchen cabinets that lower to the counter with the touch of a button, eliminating the need for a step stool. Rustic - tech chic is hot, particularly with millennials who like the yin and yang approach to home decorating.
